pages.text: Safeguard is an old cruiser with modern tech crudely soldered to each sides, providing it with the capability of generating shields. Its shield generators hover above the ocean.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/shield_placer)$(l)Shield Projector/$$(br)Safeguard projects a $(l)2 HP shield/$ at the given location, which covers $(l)3 by 3 tiles/$. The ability has $(l)1 Use/$ and costs $(l)12 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(l)Mini Shield Dome/$$(br)Safeguard projects a shield around itself, covering $(l)3 by 3 tiles/$. This shield has $(l)3 HP/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
